mdRecord.dcterms:description: "... a memorial for North Easton's citizens lost in the American Civil War, a public area, and a carriage promenade with views of North Easton. It consists of boulders heaped into a long, asymmetric mound across a rustic archway that echoes those of H. H. Richardson's nearby Oakes Ames Memorial Hall..." -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Rockery [work]
